title: Woman in casket with light colored quilted satin, floral arrangement, and medal with ribbon, on platform with dark patterned fabric skirt, in front of tall screen with dark patterned fabric and light colored valance, surrounded by ferns and floral arrangements, two ribbons inscribed "Mt.
